divs: Sighting DetailsI was getting asigned into teams in soccer as my 2 friends were doing laps, and when the object floated down, they looked at it then, I did not see the two until after gym. On of them had a scar across his shoulder that he did not have before.
trends: There have been 56 other sightings in Buffalo
There was one other sighting in Buffalo on or around May 6th 2012
Summary: Well, my two friend were running laps and suddenly this triangular thing came from the sky. I did not see what happened after that but when we got out my friend said his sight had turned red and bam! There was a scar on his shoulder.
